steam_ugc_get_subscribed_items: This function will populate a DS list with all the published file IDs for the items that the user is currently subscribed to. You must first create the list and store the index in a variable, then pass this to the function. The function will return <tt>true</tt> if everything is correct and the Steam API is initialised, or <tt>false</tt> if there is an error.
The above code will create an empty DS list and then populate it with the file IDs for all subscribed items for the user.
